visual.name: scvationProcessFlow
visual.description: Powerful flow chart visualization for process analysis directly in Power BI. The Process Flow visual from SCvation displays process data in an easy to digest and highly customizable flow chart. Key figures of the process under analysis, such as average duration (overall and between events) and number of event occurrences, are computed on the fly and made available to the user as part of the main visualization. Additionaly features include a built-in variant chart that supports selections, zooming (both visually and on data level), customizable tooltips for displaying supplementary information for each event and of course integration with available Power BI features.
